name: Triple Beat
description:
Triple Beat was a game made by a team of 6 at the Kennesaw State University Game Jam at the end of August 2016. The game is about a cop who is supposed to be chasing a criminal through a rave. You must fight your way endlessly through intoxicated ravers.

The game is less complete than some of us hoped, but is it more complete than any of us actually expected it to be.

The game is not going to be developed further and this is its final revision.

Enjoy!
